attributes.action: For all sexual misconduct against minors to serve a life sentence without parole
attributes.additional_details: Because it is of the up most moral importance that peadophiles of any kind should be removed from society as they are a true evil and shouldn't be allowed to take part in society like a normal person.
attributes.background: The government should bring this into law with no hesitation and in regards to any historical cases or perviously convicted people should have this rule applied to them aswell.
